page.title: 14Tourism
page.content: There are few facilities specially for tourists, most come when the weather is too bad for the beach, to visit the shops - Truro has the best shopping centre in Cornwall - see the Cathedral -the only one West of Exeter,and about 100 years old - and perhaps visit the Museum - the largest in the County, with a good coverage of local history, and a unique collection of minerals. Trips on the River from Truro to Falmouth and back are also popular with visitors. The benefits of Tourism include more and better shops and Restaurants, but there are severe traffic and parking problems in Summer caused by the influx. Some jobs are created by tourism, but they are often only seasonal. Truro would be a good holiday base for the County, as it is fairly central, but most stay outside it, nearer the coast.
